plugins.name: Beautiful Time
plugins.description: The Ratio symbol — Unicode character 2236 — is used between hours, minutes, and seconds in time. Do not use a colon (:) which is vertically aligned to the baseline, and will appear to sit low compared to the adjacent digits. Ratio (∶) is vertically centered between the baseline and the cap height.

plugins.name: Type Tokens
plugins.description:
How to use:


  1. Open the plugin in the playground file
  2. Copy the type token component to your file (do not change the component hierarchy or layer names)
  3. Using an instance of the component apply your type style to the "Example Text".
  4. Run the plugin and the numbers will be automatically populated to all variants of the component on the current page.


Note: Currently it does not work when type style line-heights are set to auto. Also it will intentionally ignore populating "Font Size" on instances that have the word "clamp" written in them.
plugins.tagline: Document all of your type styles in one place

plugins.name: Figma to Slint
plugins.description:
Slint is a native GUI toolkit written in Rust, with APIs in Rust, C++, Python, and JavaScript, designed for fast and responsive applications on all platforms.


Slint's official Figma plugin helps your design and developer teams ensure every detail your designers create can be realised in the production Slint app.


Modes

  1. As a standalone plugin for users without dev mode.
  2. In Dev Mode within Figma or Figma for VS Code to enhance the built in 'inspect' panels.


Functionality

The intent is to transfer designs from one mode to another using the relevant information available on each platform. The plugin will enable, in ever increasing capacity, the transfer of Figma content to your Slint project.


https://slint.dev/

https://github.com/slint-ui/slint
plugins.tagline: Convert Figma objects and variables into Slint

137773.name: Figma to Slint
137773.description:
Slint is a native GUI toolkit written in Rust, with APIs in Rust, C++, Python, and JavaScript, designed for fast and responsive applications on all platforms.


Slint's official Figma plugin helps your design and developer teams ensure every detail your designers create can be realised in the production Slint app.


Modes

  1. As a standalone plugin for users without dev mode.
  2. In Dev Mode within Figma or Figma for VS Code to enhance the built in 'inspect' panels.


Functionality

The intent is to transfer designs from one mode to another using the relevant information available on each platform. The plugin will enable, in ever increasing capacity, the transfer of Figma content to your Slint project.


https://slint.dev/

https://github.com/slint-ui/slint
137773.release_notes:
This version enables the export of design tokens (variables for colors, numbers, strings, and booleans) defined in Figma directly into `.slint` files. This feature fully supports Figma's modes, allowing for themeable designs (e.g., light and dark modes) and generates the necessary Slint structures to use these tokens seamlessly in your Slint application.

When paired with the variable export, the inspector now inserts variables into the code, if they are used in the Figma file.

Additionally we have enabled the color picker to display and search these global libraries when imported into your project.
137773.tagline: Convert Figma objects and variables into Slint

plugins.name: My Real Plugin
plugins.description:
My Real Plugin: Figma 플러그인 정리 도우미


MRP (My Real Plugin)를 통해 피그마 플러그인을 손쉽게 정리하고 관리해 보세요. 다양한 플러그인을 효율적으로 정리할 수 있으며, 처음 피그마를 사용하는 디자이너라면 카테고리별로 많이 사용되는 플러그인을 추천받을 수 있습니다.


주요 기능:


1. 플러그인 정리하기: 내가 사용하는 플러그인들을 검색하거나, URL을 이용해서 카테고리별로 정리해보세요. 평소 활용하는 플러그인들이 많다면 유용하게 활용할 수 있습니다.

2. 많이 사용되는 플러그인 추천: 특정 카테고리에서 많이 쓰이는 플러그인들은 URL이 없어도 MRP에서 바로 추가할 수 있습니다. 즉, 일일이 URL을 찾지 않고도 MRP 내에서 인기 플러그인을 쉽게 추가할 수 있죠.


활용 방법:


- 피그마 초보자: 피그마를 처음 시작했을 때 어떤 플러그인을 써야 할지 막막하다면, MRP에 있는 카테고리별로 추천된 플러그인들을 확인해보세요. 자주 쓰이는 플러그인들을 한눈에 보고 내 리스트에 추가할 수 있습니다.

- 효율적인 관리: 자주 쓰는 플러그인을 미리 저장해두면, 매번 검색할 필요 없이 필요한 순간에 빠르게 찾아 사용할 수 있어 작업 효율이 높아집니다.


  1. 피그마에서 많은 플러그인을 사용하는 디자이너라면, MRP가 필수입니다. 매번 어떤 플러그인을 사용할지 고민할 필요 없이, 한 번 저장해둔 플러그인을 빠르게 찾아 시간을 절약하고 더 효율적으로 작업해 보세요.



My Real Plugin: Figma Plugin Organizer


Plugin Introduction

Make your design work more efficient! MRP is a plugin that helps designers intuitively organize and manage numerous plugins. It simplifies your design process and helps you quickly find the tools you need.


Key Features

  1. Customizable Categories: Add and manage categories as you wish to build your own plugin archive.
  2. Intuitive UI: Escape from complex plugin management with an easy and simple user interface. Find the plugins you want with just a few clicks.
  3. Favorites Feature: Add frequently used plugins to your favorites for quick access anytime.


Future Features

  1. Search and Filter Functionality
  2. Plugin Ranking and Recommendation Features


If you need any more information, free to ask!
plugins.tagline: orgainize your plugins

plugins.name: Tag Filter
plugins.description:
Usage

You can show or hide specific layers in a batch.


How to use

Set “#TAG/{tag name}” as the layer name.


The tags you set will be listed in the plug-in window.


By selecting the tag you want to display, unselected tags will be hidden.



Ex: #TAG/SAMPLE01, #TAG/SAMPLE02, #TAG/SAMPLE03
plugins.tagline: This plugin allows you to show or hide layers by setting a specific tag as a layer name.

  4. Accept the consent screen. Blueprint requires READ permissions of the Figma file.
  5. You are ready to refer the frame from Blueprint!

plugins.name: Local Variables Manipulator
plugins.description:
Local Variables Manipulator (LVM)

(Description in English)

  1. LVM is a Local Variables Exporter / Importer
  2. You can get data of Local Variables as JSON by Export.
  3. And you can update or insert Local Variables by using same format JSON.


(Description in Japanese)

  1. LVM は Local Variables の Exporter / Importer です。
  2. Local Variables の登録内容を JSON で Export できます。
  3. Export したものと同じ形式の JSON を使って Import できます。


Example JSON

{
"ColorExample": {
"Alias Token/primary": {
"$variableValues": {
"Light": "$Global Token/blue/100",
"Dark": "$Global Token/blue/100"
},
"$description": "",
"$codeSyntax": {
"WEB": "color.aliasToken.primary"
},
"$scopes": [
"ALL_SCOPES"
],
"$hiddenFromPublishing": false
},
"Global Token/blue/100": {
"$variableValues": {
"Light": "#0000FF",
"Dark": "#0000FF"
},
"$description": "",
"$codeSyntax": {
"WEB": "color.globalToken.blue['100']"
},
"$scopes": [
"ALL_SCOPES"
],
"$hiddenFromPublishing": false
}
}
}
plugins.tagline: Export / Import Local Variables

plugins.name: Font Manager
plugins.description: You can select any text boxes and change the font of a specific text type. Currently only supports Korean, English, and numerical value.
plugins.tagline: Select a Text box and change the font of selected Text Type!

110510.name: Font Manager
110510.description: You can select any text boxes and change the font of a specific text type. Currently only supports Korean, English, and numerical value.
110510.release_notes:
1. Improved multi-language text detection and font application:
    Added support for Chinese (Traditional & Simplified)
    Added support for Japanese (Hiragana, Katakana, Kanji)
    Added support for Hindi (Devanagari script)

2. Enhanced symbol and number handling:
    Better separation between numerical values and symbols
    More precise detection of special characters and punctuation
    Fixed issues where numbers and symbols were being confused

3. Upgraded text processing algorithm:
    More accurate script detection for mixed-language text
    Better handling of consecutive characters in the same script
    Improved detection of language boundaries in mixed text

Switched from regex-based to Unicode-range-based detection
More efficient text processing with single-pass analysis
Better grouping of continuous text ranges for font application
110510.tagline: Select a Text box and change the font of selected Text Type!

plugins.name: Marvelous Avatars
plugins.description:
What You Can Expect from This Plugin

  1. Generate Unique Marvel Avatars: Easily create avatars featuring Marvel’s iconic characters for use in your designs, perfect for adding a heroic touch to user profiles, mockups, and more.
  2. Fill Shapes with Marvel Images: Instantly fill any shape in your Figma design with high-quality images from the Marvel universe, making your designs visually captivating and thematic.
  3. Marvel-Themed Lorem Ipsum: Replace standard placeholder text with fun and engaging Marvel data text, adding character and flair to your design mockups.
  4. Prefilled Data or Real-Time Fetching: Use the plugin’s prefilled Marvel data for quick access or connect your own Marvel Developer API credentials to fetch collections by name, randomly, or page by page, for the most up-to-date content.


Perfect for Designers Who

  1. Work on projects related to comics, superheroes, or fan sites.
  2. Want to bring a pop culture twist to their design work.
  3. Need unique placeholder content that stands out.
  4. With "Marvelous Avatars," you can quickly integrate Marvel’s universe into your Figma projects, enhancing your designs with iconic characters and stories.
plugins.tagline: Bring Marvel Universe to your Figma designs

  4. Prefilled Data or Real-Time Fetching: Use the plugin’s prefilled Marvel data for quick access or connect your own Marvel Developer API credentials to fetch collections by name, randomly, or page by page, for the most up-to-date content.


Perfect for Designers Who

plugins.name: Column Creator v2 - Auto-layout helper
plugins.description:
🌟 Introducing Column Creator v2


📊 Design Precision:

Craft pixel-perfect columns of various widths effortlessly.


🔄 Seamless Edits:

Your design evolves, and so does our plugin – automatic resizing at its best!


🎨 Easy to use:

The plugin makes use of the core features of Figma so you don't have to edit a bunch of settings inside the plugin. It's plug and play on all frames with autolayout!


💡 Unleash Your Creativity:

Our plugin empowers you to focus on what truly matters – your design vision.


🆕All new in this version:

Easily create designs with multipole widths or all of the same. Use the shortcuts for even faster changes!


How it works - Children inside

  1. Select one or more frames with autolayout enabled
  2. It uses the gap from the autolayout frame so no need for extra inputs
  3. Select the amount of columns you want the items inside to be and click
  4. Watch your item(s) get the width of the selected amount of columns.


How it works - Selection

  1. Select one or more frames within a frame with autolayout enabled
  2. It uses the gap from the autolayout frame so no need for extra inputs
  3. Select the amount of columns you want the item(s) to be and click
  4. Watch your item(s) get the width of the selected amount of columns.


Want to buy me a coffee?

To help as many people as possible I will keep my plugins completely free. But if my plugin helped you and you want to buy me a coffee you can do that here: https://buymeacoffee.com/sven.figma

plugins.name: CropTop
plugins.description:
Bring the power of CSS's background-position right into Figma with CropTop! Perfect for designers who need precise control over their image positioning within layers. Whether you're working with a single image or handling multiple selections, CropTop streamlines the process and ensures your designs look sharp.


Key Features:


🌌 CSS Familiarity: Enjoy the intuitive and familiar CSS-like method for image positioning. It's the background-position feature Figma has been missing.


🛍️ Bulk Handling: Process multiple images at once with ease, making design iterations faster and more efficient.


⚡ Quick-Fix Sidebar Shortcut: Changed the size of a layer and squished your image? No problem. With one click in the sidebar, repeat the last positioning and get it looking perfect again.


How to Use:

  1. Select a layer or multiple layers in your Figma design.
  2. Open the CropTop plugin.
  3. Choose your desired position anchor.
  4. Let CropTop seamlessly position and adjust your images within the layers.


Feedback & Support:

Love CropTop? Your feedback fuels us. Encounter any issues or have feature suggestions? Please reach out in the comments. We're always working to make CropTop even better for you.
plugins.tagline: Position cropped images in CSS-like way

plugins.name: StackBlitz - design to instant dev environment in a click
plugins.description:
Implementing designs in code becomes much easier when you don't have to manually set up the environment, open and run the project, and search for the correct file. You can have all this work done for you by clicking a link!


How to use the plugin?

  • Make sure Dev Mode is on (⇧+D)
  • Select a layer
  • Open in the StackBlitz plugin and paste a URL of a repository with the code of your project. You can also use the URL of a specific file within this repository: typically, a component file, for instance: https://github.com/stackblitz/docs/blob/main/.vitepress/theme/components/CardLists/CardList.vue
  • Click the "Create instant environment link" button to have the link generated for the selected layer.


The link is now added to the layer's Dev resources.


When you click it, a new tab will open with the full IDE loaded with your project. If your link included a file, this file will already be open in the editor.


When to use it?

We suggest providing instant environment links, especially for the essential components in your app. The components that might need adjustments in future are good candidates as well.


Generally, every time a developer looks at a component in Figma to make changes in the code, having a resource link handy will make their work so much easier!
plugins.tagline: Select a layer and add a GitHub URL to get a reasource that opens a full development environment

plugins.name: Text to Stickies for toitta
plugins.description:
このプラグインは、主に発話分析ソリューション「toitta」を利用しているユーザーに便利な機能を提供しています。


Text to Stickies for toittaは、toittaで一括コピーしたテキスト（切片）を簡単に付箋としてFigma/FigJamに出力できるプラグインです。

操作は直感的で、toittaからコピーしたテキストをプラグインUIにペーストするだけ。付箋はハイパーリンクとして生成され、リンクをクリックすることで該当するtoittaの切片に素早くアクセスできます。

ユーザーがデザインやリサーチのプロセスを効率化するための強力なツールです。


機能説明：


⚫︎テキストの付箋化

toittaからコピーしたテキスト切片をそのままペーストして、付箋としてFigma/FigJamに追加できます。


⚫︎ハイパーリンク生成

付箋にはリンクが含まれており、toittaの該当切片にワンクリックで移動可能です。


⚫︎簡単操作

直感的なUIで、複雑な操作を必要とせず、数ステップで作業を完了できます。


関連リンク：

plugins.name: Text Find Replace
plugins.description:
Find & Replace Plugin for Figma

Effortlessly streamline your design workflow with the Find & Replace plugin for Figma. This intuitive tool allows you to quickly identify and modify selected text layers across your design, enhancing your efficiency and ensuring consistency in your typography.


Key Features:


User-Friendly Interface: Easily navigate through the plugin with a clean and straightforward layout. Enter the text you want to find and the text you wish to replace it with in just a few clicks.


Dynamic Text Highlighting: As you type in the "Find" field, matching text within the selected layers is instantly highlighted, providing a clear visual cue to help you confirm your selection before making any changes.


Preview of Changes: View a live preview of selected text, with matching words bolded and replaced text shown next to them. This feature allows you to visualize changes before applying them, ensuring you achieve the desired outcome.


Bulk Replacement: Replace multiple instances of text across various layers simultaneously, saving you time and effort. Whether it's a single word or a phrase, you can modify your design's language with ease.


Instant Feedback: Receive notifications upon completion of text replacements, ensuring you’re informed of the changes made.


Cancel Option: If you change your mind, simply hit the cancel button to revert any unsaved changes, giving you peace of mind as you work.


With the Find & Replace plugin, enhance your design process by eliminating tedious text editing tasks and maintaining uniformity in your projects. Try it today and experience the difference in your Figma workflow!


Icon Credits :

<a href="https://www.flaticon.com/free-icons/search" title="search icons">Search icons created by Dimitry Miroliubov - Flaticon</a>

plugins.name: exportColorInGamut
plugins.description:
Figma/Figjam export color in correct gamut


> Note: This plugin is aimed at developers/designers working with a environment/monitor that supports a color space with a wider gamut than sRGB (specifivally p3). Figma running in a browser is limited to sRGB currently, however the desktop app supports the option to use the native OS one. You may need to enable this in the settings under: Figma > Preferences > Color Space > Unmanaged.


Motivation


When working in a wider color gamut (like the display of a modern macbook, supporting p3) and copying colors to be rendered on the web you may find them to look different (notably less saturated), to what you designed. This is to some extent an inevitable consequence of converting to a smaller color gamut (sRGB), as some colors simply cannot be represented there. There are two main strategies, each with benefits and drawbacks, to convert p3 colors to sRGB (or any larger color space to a smaller). Either you scale the colors linearly, always maintaining contrast (so two different colors in p3 will look different in sRGB), but loosing perceptual uniformity (most colors will look notably different, as a consequence of the linear mapping to a smaller color space).


The second approach is implemented in this plugin. There we ensure that a color which is in both color spaces stays perceptually uniform (looks the same), but neglect that on the extreme end of the p3 color space (regarding colors that cannot be represented in sRGB) colors are cut off. So e.g. the reddest red in p3 gets mapped to reddest red in sRGB, but so do all reds in p3 that exceed the reddes red in sRGB.


Implementation

The specific implementation outlined above is by colorjs.io.


Note that this is not the only solution for this problem. As of recently the web is no longer sRGB limited. The new CSS Color Module Level 4 specifies the color() function with which we can represent colors in wider color spaces, when supported. Hence we can use it to more directly "copy" values from figma to the css. Copy is in quotes here because there is no direct copy button in figma to do this. In essence it is a 1 to 1 mapping (of course), only in a slightly different syntax (base 1, instead of base 255). This plugin formats a string containing both approaches, first the new css color() function, then the computed mapping to sRGB. In correct order, so that the sRGB version is used as fallback, if the client browser does not support the new API. Depending on the adaption progress of the CSS Color Module Level 4 spec, you may opt to omit the sRGB version of coverage is sufficiant.


> Note that this plugin is currently only aimed displays/environment using the p3 color space, if you are on a different one (that is supported by colorjs.io, please write me / submit a issue and I will try to make it more modular)


Usage


Select any element, and run the plugin. A string like the following will be copied to your clipboard:


background: rgb(71.942% 0% 5.7326%);
background: color(display-p3 0.6583 0.1125 0.1125);


Limitations


Gradient fills and opacity are not supported yet. If you need them, please write me / submit an issue and I will try to add this feature.


This plugin is intentionally only concerned with filled colors (text, strokes, background...) editable in figma. If you want to export an asset in the correct color space, please refer to Export PNG with Color Profile.

accepted.name: Maximilian Mairinger
accepted.description: Web advocate, passionate about Typescript, image compression, UI design and emergency medicine. Currently, studying AI at JKU.

plugins.tagline: Export colors in wider color space with wider gamut (p3). With properly interpolated sRGB fallback.

plugins.name: Clear Bottom
plugins.description:
Clear Bottom: A Simple Figma Plugin for Lazy Designers


Hello Figma Community!


I’m excited to introduce my new plugin, Clear Bottom, crafted for those who want to simplify their workflow without any development experience.


What is Clear Bottom?


Clear Bottom is a straightforward Figma plugin designed to tackle a common issue: the empty area at the bottom of your frames. If you’ve ever faced the frustration of manually adjusting each frame to remove these gaps, this plugin is here to help.


How Does It Work?


  1. Select Multiple Frames (Or single): Choose the frames with gaps at the bottom.
  2. Run the Plugin: Clear Bottom automatically removes the empty space at the bottom of each selected frame.
  3. Preserves Design Elements: Your design elements stay in place and unchanged.


Feel free to provide feedback or ask questions. I hope this plugin makes your design process a bit smoother!


Happy designing!
plugins.tagline: Clear empty bottom space in Figma frames effortlessly, without moving or resizing elements in them.

  1. 일상생활에서 수집한 레퍼런스 이미지들을 쏘스에 업로드해요.
  2. 피그마에서 쏘스 플러그인을 통해 이미지들을 바로 import 하고 디자인 작업에 참고할 수 있어요.

plugins.name: Dual Font Master
plugins.description:
New Release: "Dual Font Master" Figma Plugin


💪 What the Plugin Can Do

  1. Register text styles for English and Japanese to apply to your designs.
  2. Apply these registered text styles to your design data.
  3. When registering text styles, set the font weight to 'Auto' to carry over the original font weight.
  4. Instantly preview chosen styles to see exactly how they will look in your design.


🚨 Points to Note

  1. When setting the font weight to "Auto", please make sure that the font weight before modification is also present in the modified text. If no corresponding font family is found for the modified font, the font weight "Regular" will be set automatically.
  2. The plugin cannot process text nodes where font family or font weight attributes are set to 'mixed'.


🎬 Use Cases

Ideal for global digital products, multilingual marketing materials, and UI/UX design of websites. It maintains font consistency while enabling smooth language transitions, streamlining the design process.


📋 License

  1. The "Pencil Icon" created by guidorosso on Rive is used in the plugin. This material is provided under CC BY 4.0.
  2. For the promotional video of the plugin, we have used the "Travel Landing Page - Byoerr Web Design" by Misbachul Umam. This video includes modifications to some information and has been translated into Japanese. The original content is provided under CC BY 4.0.


------------------------------------------------------------------------


新リリース：「Dual Font Master」Figmaプラグイン


💪 プラグインができること

  1. デザインに適用する英語と日本語のテキストスタイルを登録できます
  2. 登録したテキストスタイルを、デザインデータに適用します
  3. テキストスタイル登録時、フォントウェイトを「Auto」で設定することにより、修正前のフォントウェイトを引き継ぐことができます。
  4. サンプルプレビューにて、選択したスタイルが実際にどのように見えるかを即座に確認可能です。


🚨 ご留意いただきたい点

  1. フォントウェイトを「Auto」で設定する場合、修正前のフォントウェイトが、修正後のテキストにもあることをご確認ください。もし修正後のフォントに対応するフォントファミリーが見つからない場合、フォントウェイト「Regular」が自動的に設定されます。
  2. テキストノード内でフォントファミリーやフォントウェイトの属性が 'mixed' とされている場合、プラグインは処理を行うことができません。


🎬 利用シーン

グローバルなデジタルプロダクト、多言語マーケティング素材、ウェブサイトのUI/UXデザインに最適です。フォントの一貫性を維持しながら、言語間の滑らかな移行を実現し、デザインプロセスの迅速化をサポートします。


📋 ライセンス

  1. Rive 上で guidorosso によって作成された「Pencil Icon」が、プラグイン内で使用されています。この素材は CC BY 4.0 の下で提供されています。
  2. プラグインの紹介動画にて、Misbachul Umam の「Travel Landing Page - Byoerr Web Design」を使用しています。本紹介動画では情報の一部を修正し、日本語に翻訳しています。元のコンテンツは CC BY 4.0 の下で提供されています。
plugins.tagline: This plugin styles English and Japanese text for unified multilingual design.

  1. フォントウェイトを「Auto」で設定する場合、修正前のフォントウェイトが、修正後のテキストにもあることをご確認ください。もし修正後のフォントに対応するフォントファミリーが見つからない場合、フォントウェイト「Regular」が自動的に設定されます。
  2. テキストノード内でフォントファミリーやフォントウェイトの属性が 'mixed' とされている場合、プラグインは処理を行うことができません。


🎬 利用シーン

グローバルなデジタルプロダクト、多言語マーケティング素材、ウェブサイトのUI/UXデザインに最適です。フォントの一貫性を維持しながら、言語間の滑らかな移行を実現し、デザインプロセスの迅速化をサポートします。


📋 ライセンス
